LanguageData.RR_EnergyNeedDescription: Energy is the amount of retained charge output from the internal reactor. If it hits zero, the persona will enter an inefficient low-power mode. If charge is not restored, hardware will eventually critically malfunction, and the persona will cease functioning.
LanguageData.RR_MemoryNeedDescription: Memory is the amount of time between each system defragment. Advanced personae must regularly enter a semi-comatose state to purge useless info from their AI cores to avoid memory overloads. If they go too long without it, they will involuntarily shutdown until excess memory is purged.
LanguageData.RR_LowEnergySelfShutdown: {PAWN_nameDef} is in self-shutdown from low energy.
LanguageData.RR_SelfRepairTip: {0} with self-repair enabled will automatically repair themselves on the spot at {1} the normal efficiency.
LanguageData.RR_MustBeAssignedToRepair: To self-repair, {1_labelShort} must also be assigned to Smithing work.
LanguageData.RR_MustBeCapableToRepair: {1_labelShort} must be capable of smithing to make repairs.
LanguageData.RR_MustHaveEnergyToRepair: {1_labelShort} must have energy to be able to self-repair.
LanguageData.RR_BioNotSynthetic: {PAWN_nameDef} must be synthetic to be able to use this.
LanguageData.RR_SynthNotBiological: {PAWN_nameDef} must be biological to be able to use this.
LanguageData.RR_SynthCannotBeUnnatHealed: Cannot use unnatural healing: {PAWN_nameDef} is not biological.
LanguageData.RR_SynthCannotBeFleshshaped: Cannot target: {PAWN_nameDef} cannot be biologically altered or mutated.
LanguageData.RR_SynthCorpseCannotBeFleshshaped: Cannot target: targeted corpse is not biological.
LanguageData.RR_SynthMutatorObeliskFailedLetter: While interacting with the obelisk, {PAWN_nameDef} suddenly felt {PAWN_possessive} body buckle for a few moments. The feeling quickly passed.\n\nThe obelisk tried, but cannot mutate {PAWN_nameDef}.
LanguageData.RR_SynthNotGenetic: Personae do not carry a genetic code.
LanguageData.RR_SynthCannotBeScanned: Personae do not have viable neuro-patterns.
LanguageData.RR_SynthVsDevourer: The devourer would not be able to digest {PAWN_nameDef}.
LanguageData.SynthFactionGreetingWarm:
Cmn.cntact_{0}

Pinging...

Contact_successful

Result___{NEGOTIATOR_labelShort}.translate.(CONTACT RECEIVED, WHAT BUSINESS DO YOU WISH TO CONTUCT)
